article_title: Dollar Weakens on Investors’ Dim Short-Term Views
article_text:
The dollar resumed its decline against the euro and the yen on Wednesday as investors sought a clearer direction on U.S. borrowing costs and the economy one week after the Federal Reserve’s policy meeting.

The euro gained 0.5% against the dollar to $1.0973 in late-afternoon trade, rising for the sixth time in the past eight sessions. The dollar retreated 0.3% against the Japanese currency to ¥119.41, maintaining a trading range around...
